name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid
acetic acid
and optionally sulfuric acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No.7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7),  and optionally sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
